availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p: At a Special Term of the Wayne County Court held at the Court House in Monticello on the 5th day of January 1863

Present
Hon J E Wright Judge

Ordered that J E Vickrey be and he is hereby appointed Coroner for Wayne County to fill the vancancy occasioned by Edmund Butler failing to qualify which is ordered to be certified to his excellency the Governor of the Commonwealth

I John L. Sallee Clerk of the County Court for Wayne County do certify the above and foregoing order to be a true transcript of record in my office which is certified to his Excellency the Governor of the Commonwealth

Witness John L. Sallee Clerk this the 5th day of January 1863
Jno L. Sallee clk

Wayne Co
Coronor
J. E. Vickrey
Com Issd Jany 16. 1863
